result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

OFF RECORD / 3:05 PM Defendant Christopher Scott Hergert not in court.  Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt in court for Christopher Scott Hergert.  Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Thomas-Schmidt makes comment on DEF non appearance. Court sets new status conference.

Status conference on January 3, 2023 at 02:30 pm.

Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attny Thomas-Schmidt refers to DEF,  DEF request adjournment.  Court reset.
Status conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on October 18, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on June 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

OFF THE RECORD / 11:07AM - Defendant Christopher Scott Hergert appeared by video, in custody from Barron County Jail, with Atty Alysja Otten, appearing on behalf of Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt, who was not in court. Attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Otten requests reset due to the absence of Atty Thomas-Schmidt.  Court resets STC to 6/28/22 at 2:30PM.
Status conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Status conference on June 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

11:10 AM Defendant Christopher Scott Hergert appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt in court for Christopher Scott Hergert.  Prosecuting attorney Kenneth N. Sortedahl in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Court indicates INFO filed.  Atty Thomas-Schmidt acknowledges receipt, waive reading, enter pleas of NG on behalf of DEF.  Court enters NG plea. Court finds probable cause and binds DEF over for trial.  Atty Thomas-Schmidt requests STC.  Court sets STC for
Status conference scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.

10:50 AM Defendant Christopher Scott Hergert in court with attorney Stephanie E Thomas-Schmidt appears by zoom.  Defendant Christopher Scott Hergert in custody appears by video.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared by zoom for the State of Wisconsin.    Court calls case and recites appearances.  Attny Thomas-Schmidt indicates to proceed with preliminary hearing.  DEF agrees to proceed.   State calls witness City of Hayward Officer Dillon Saraniecki,  State request Court to take Judicial Notice of Felony Conviction Barron County 18CF290,  Attny Thomas-Schmidt no objection. Court takes judicial notice.   Court sworn in witness.  State begins examination. 10:54 AM  Witness identified the DEF, court indicates the record will reflect.   10:56 AM  Attny Thomas-Schmidt  objection - leading-  Court request state re-ask question.  State rephrased question, and continued examination.   9:01 AM  Witness identified the DEF, court indicates the record will reflect.  State tenders witness.   11:00 AM  Cross-Examination by Attorney Thomas-Schmidt.    Attny Thomas-Schmidt no further questions.  11:02 AM  Witness excused.   No further witness by either party.   State request for bind over.  Attny Thomas-Schmidt no argument.  Court finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.  
  Arraignment scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 11:00 am.

DEF verifies Name, DOB, and address.  Court enters NG plea.  Atty Thomas-Schmidt request prelim but waives time limits.  DEF agrees with waiver.  Court sets prelim for 3/25/22 at 10:45AM.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 25, 2022 at 10:45 am.
Initial appearance on March 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Initial appearance scheduled for March 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
CASH BOND RETURNED FROM JAIL MARKED REFUSED AS DEFENDANT REFUSED TO SIGN BOND.

1:30 PM  Defendant Christopher S. Hergert  in court, in custody appears by video.  Jennifer Gross appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Probable Cause found by court.  Attny Christian Ness (Special Appearance) indicates DEF refused to speak to PD office, so appearance will be made today.    Court gives the DEF the attorney colloquy.  State makes bond recommendation.  Attny Ness  no comment to bond. DEF no comment to bond  Court sets bond.   CBS $5000    ABSOLUTE SOBRIETY/ No Possession or Consumption of Alcoholic Beverages.  May not possess any controlled substance or paraphernalia.     No drug use without a valid prescription and if prescribed must take as DR ordered.  

Defendant shall be subject to testing of their blood, breath, saliva and/or urine to ensure compliance with absolute sobriety provision. Within 24 hours of release from custody (not including weekends/holidays) defendant shall report to Justice Point Pre-Trial Services at 10610 Main Street Suite 101, Hayward, WI 54843. Phone: 715-804-0109 OR 715-338-3976 for orientation and to establish testing procedures and options.   INITIAL APPEARANCE set for March 8, 2022 @ 8:30 AM
